upload.title: CSV Upload
upload.subtitle: Upload CSV file exported from your bank or app
upload.dropDescription: Drag and drop CSV file here, or click to select
upload.dropImageDescription: Drag and drop image file here, or click to select
upload.addMoreDescription: Drag and drop or click to add more CSV files
upload.addMoreImageDescription: Drag and drop or click to add more images
upload.supportedApps: Supported apps: Zaim, MoneyForward, Rakuten Card
upload.alertSelectImage: Please select a PNG or JPG image
upload.alertMaxSize: File size must be 10MB or less
upload.paypayRequirement1: Screenshot from PayPay app transaction history
upload.accountHint: Select an account to link imported transactions for better tracking
upload.faqQuestion1: Which apps' CSV formats are supported?
upload.faqAnswer1: Currently supports CSV export formats from Zaim, MoneyForward, Rakuten Card, and Sumitomo Mitsui Card. Other formats can be adjusted via column mapping in settings.
upload.faqAnswer2: Transactions with identical date, amount, and description are automatically skipped. You can see the count of skipped duplicates in the upload results.
upload.faqQuestion3: What happens if there are errors?
upload.faqAnswer3: Rows with errors are displayed with details. You can fix and re-upload the error data. Valid rows are imported successfully.
